lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good evening, everybody. Welcome to terrible decisions in my life. Welcome to Critical Role. We are doing Vampire: The Masquerade. Sort of. Well, we're going to talk about it. We're doing kind of a homebrew thing. It's going to be fun. It's going to be weird. It's going to be dark and really inappropriate and I'm so sorry. If any of you are a little squeamish, it's going to get a little weird, and I'm so sorry. I was a big fan of this game 25 years ago. This game and the World of Darkness, Werewolf: The Apocalypse, Mage: The Ascension, Changeling: The Dreaming, and all of these games were a big part of all of our lives and they really affected us and changed us. It was an introduction to roleplaying for a lot of people who may not have been comfortable with Dungeons & Dragons of something obviously much more serious, because look at us. We're so much more serious right now. The build that we're going to be running is kind of a mix of, as I'm checking my notes, the new v5 Alpha. It's also a little bit of Onyx, it's a bit of my old homebrew that I found bits and pieces of while cleaning my room, all mushed together. If you're interested in this game, there's a brand-new version in Alpha right now that you can play around with. There's also the old school stuff that Onyx has put out which is the size of a small library. You can go in and find books on every city and every type of creature you could want. There's weird, angry 80s versions of everybody. I want to do a special thanks to Jason Carl, White Wolf, Onyx Path, and Don and Katherine, if you're watching, for running really good games, and Sasha and Juliet for running very good games. Sasha's not watching; she's at marching band. You've got marching to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This music, Taliesin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have some announcements that, in theory, I was supposed to have, but I don't. I know some of them off the top of my head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can help you out there, Taliesin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can start there with Backblaze.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is the camera on me? Our sponsor tonight is Backblaze! Yev from Backblaze is back again to peddle his wares. Backblaze is unlimited backup for Macs and PCs. You can use mobile apps to access data on the go. You can recover files by mail using a flash key or hard drive. They'll ship it to your door to restore your data. And you get a 15-day, fully-featured free trial if you go to backblaze.com/criticalrole. To honor our fine people at Backblaze, I have composed a rap in the style of Sir Mix-A-Lot. Ahem. Oh boy, I should have rehearsed this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You and me fucking both.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like backups and I cannot lie! Those other brothers can't deny! When a virus hits and your hard drive quits, but you backed up all your shit you get sprung! Wanna act all tough 'cause you know it's all backed up. So fellas!

lines.name: TRAVIS, MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fellas!

lines.name: TRAVIS, MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Storing lots of porn?

lines.name: TRAVIS, MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You better store it!

lines.name: TRAVIS, MATT
lines.text: Store it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hoard it!

lines.name: TRAVIS, MATT
lines.text: Hoard it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Store those gigs of smut! Baby got Backblaze! (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Backblaze rap!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Backblaze! Check it out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, it's only uphill from here. That's good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very nice, Sam.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was beautiful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we're all vampires tonight, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is the camera even picking us up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know; can you see us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you see us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just your jewelry floating around in the empty space.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was about to be nerdy enough to say that all vampires in the White Wolf universe are picked up by electronics. Yeah. There's only one clan that even is not reflected in the mirror.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was just testing you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know some of this! I don't know all of it. I remember some of this from high school. Got to be able to LARP this stuff. Do we have anything new in merch?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it's the same stuff in merch, but we also have the art book coming out! The one we talked about.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, the new comic!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan and Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you read it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's good, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The troublesome twosome. Pretty sweet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pretty good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Putting it out there for anyone watching that I don't have the rest of the announcements, so if there's anything that anybody wanted me to say, they should put it on here with a piece of paper at some point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The comic book is amazing. Beardless Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's like a baby! A baby in the woods.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's weird looking at your D&D characters and being like, "Oh! They were so young! They were babies!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh look, they're alive!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The writing is fucking brilliant, as always, Colville is amazing. Olivia Samson.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good action, good art. It's good stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to be doing Slave Labor Graphics on Wednesday Club. It's going to be Johnny The Homicidal Maniac and all sorts of gothy comic books for Halloween. We're going to be doing Gather Your Ghost tomorrow because it's funny when I do a show three days in a row. Four days in a row here!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sagas of Sundry: Madness is coming out next week! Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should have worn the black wig tonight!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought it would be spoilery.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You had free time; you could have pulled that together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I thought about it. I was like, "Should I? Eh."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trying to think if there was anything else off the top of my head. I feel like I'm missing something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vamp as much as you want, Taliesin, you have to start the game soon. (laughter) Look, I don't get to enjoy giving you shit from this side of the table.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For the record, this is intimidating! Holy cow. I feel like I want to adjust my desktop settings. This is a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm scared of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should be. This is evil and terrible. This is a brand-new game system, so we're going to be taking it slow. For those of you at home who know Vampire: The Masquerade, this is going to be a very barebones thing. We've cut a lot of fat. We've cut a lot of something. We've cut a lot of limbs from this baby, but it is going to be dark. There are going to be hints of what's going on in the real world, but we're keeping this very insulated, so it's not going to be a lot of world-building. Ah, thank you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's also going to be a Talks Machina next week on Tuesday discussing this one shot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, there will be.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it going to have a different name?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're still in Batman, which is great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! Still there; they haven't gotten rid of me yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if we're talking about Thrashtopia yet, but eventually we're talking about Thrashtopia because Thrashtopia's cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Thrashtopia has been uttered into the universe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's available on Amazon Echo, Echo Dot, Echo Plus, and other Alexa-enabled devices.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe you just yell loud into a canyon, it echoes back to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just say, "Alexa, how do you want to do this?" and it plays.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would be amazing! Wouldn't it?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could we make that happen? I'm going to talk to Ben!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know how things work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ben. Let's make it happen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's what Ben wanted me to say. Ben.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so cool. Make it so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This'll be a d10 system, so everyone remembers. It's going to be a six and above is a win.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got so many d10s in my tray right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll explain the red dice. We're going to take this through, and it's going to be really weird. I am so sorry for everything that's about to happen. I'm going to try to maintain my cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's do this shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: [dramatic music] (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I legitimately can say I understand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not going to save you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. When we last left off, we were finishing up a very emotional, very heavy and intense episode of Critical Role.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. Super meta.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're hungry, you're thirsty, you're not entirely sure, but you're waking up and it is pitch black.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anyone around us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you see anything? Take a look! It's very dark and there's nothing around. You're lying on your back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Each of us alone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Each of you alone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Put my hand up and feel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to start shouting. Hello! Can anyone hear me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're a voice actor. You call that shouting?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's me, Sam Riegel of Critical Role!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The sound is deadened by the thick wood and the fabric.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we try to push?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, give me a strength plus melee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to Uma Thurman.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I was going to do. I'm trying to one-inch punch this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A ten and a six.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A ten and a six, that's two successes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got a ten and this X-ed-out one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I figured as much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You succeeded and you failed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. I failed as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do we roll for the one-inch punch thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you got an X-ed-out one as well?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Laura, you rolled how many?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two successes. That's all I could roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many did you get?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do I roll for one-inch punching?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Strength plus melee.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I use the red?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have to always use at least two of the red.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Always two, copy that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whatever red you have, you have to use.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I don't know what that means, but I'm into it. All are successes but two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Both of the reds are successes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You give a sharp push and the top of the coffin cracks a bit. It snaps.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit, I fucking broke it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: My strength is two, my melee is zero, which is accurate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I rolled a five and a one. So a failure and whatever the X means.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're feeling a little queasy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's about right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're not feeling good. You got to hold on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One success.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One success? All right. You give it a push and it moves a little bit. Got a little shove.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The coffin cover cracks in half. That's as far as you've gotten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did mine do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yours got a good little shove. If there was something to see outside, you would see something, but there's not yet. You start to hear a little bit of a squeak. You feel something wriggling around inside the box with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a mouse squeak?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If a mouse were bigger.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Rats?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a good guess. It could be something rat-ish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I want to eat the rat-ish?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know; do you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you like radishes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're definitely feeling hungry, and it does strangely smell appetizing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I catch it and eat it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Give me a dex roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just dex?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See what that does.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We all have rats in there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's my athletics?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Top of physical.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have athletics. Yes I do. Shut up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: These are complicated. It's going to take a second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh okay. Success, success, success, and two failures.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two failures?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But three successes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are the two failures on red dice?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, one is on a red, and one is a success on a red.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But you're holding on. You're still not feeling very well, you can't react yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there enough room to bring my knees up and start pushing with feet and hands?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not yet, but soon. You're still a little weirded out by your face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm up, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're still in your coffin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I reach my fingers through the crack in the top of the coffin and see if there's any light, cold, or anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You feel wood, I suppose. There's another layer of wood above you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No light?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No light. Not yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm yelling: I am an internet celebrity! People know me! Not many people. In obscure corners, but mostly in gaming stores.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Situationally famous.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you want to do something with that rat?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! I want to bite it like I just ate that donut!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gross.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take a big bite of that rat. All right, so give me one of your red dice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that's good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mark your hunger, if you have a pencil, to just one X.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's on the very bottom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's that at the window? Hunger! Ooh, hunger!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love that show. You're feeling a little better. You're feeling a little more clear-headed. This is not a good situation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I just eat a rat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did just eat a rat. I'm going to point out: it's not that you're not hungry any more. You're still hungry; you're just feeling a little better.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I so distracted with my face--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you're good now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, all fours, pushing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Give a good push. Give me either, yeah, fun, strength brawl or strength athletics to see if you can push it off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (grunting) I don't like it in here! The red is a ten and a two. And then a nine and one on the other dice. So success, success, failure, failure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You got the coffin lid about halfway off now. You can almost make out a layer of wood above you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to give another whack where I've already indented it. Same roll?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll give you options now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have a better melee than brawl?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it doesn't make a lot of sense. I don't quite understand it. Okay. Three successes and three failures, two failures on the red.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two failures on the red?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh, that's interesting. I'm learning how this works, one second.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like this! She eats her hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, what if she does?! What if she eats her own flesh?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Things can happen, man, I'm not going to say.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bucket list check?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make sure it's a digit you don't use very much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Start with the pinkies and work your way back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How will you pinky swear?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so sorry, I'm trying to find my one hunger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't pinky swear with evil people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Evil people don't pinky swear! Evil people middle finger swear!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Middle finger swear, yeah!

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Middle finger!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you don't feel well at all. You start scratching at your wrists. You start digging in a little bit. You're going to take one damage and you're going to start sucking your own blood because things are getting weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So dehydrated, you guys!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So much crying since last week!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to take one damage and sadly, you're getting a little weird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You get another red die! I don't even know what it means!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She has to roll three of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's all so mysterious!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I notice the rat's there and I look at my broken hand. So instead, I decide I'm going to try to coax it near me. Hey! Hey little guy! Hey buddy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to give charisma animal ken.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good! I guess we have to lean into our strengths.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a good idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six or above you said? That's three successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It thinks that you are the nicest, sweetest, most wonderful person and is so excited that it may get to play with you and be a part of the game. It comes over and it's really--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How hungry am I?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're two dice worth of hungry right now, man, that's pretty hungry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How cute is the rat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not that cute. A pescatarian would probably eat it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll eat the rat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, good for you! Your hunger's at one. Give me one of your die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whee! It actually hit the rat!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You actually just knocked--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, buddy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Poor guy. It's okay. He's going to sleep. I'll get him his coffin later.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can't see his penis any more!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll roll to try to headbutt my way out of here. Three successes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You snap that in half, and now you've just got wood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to try and reach using my superior strength and try and punch through that crack into the wood above.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Superior strength?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many strengths does he have?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: More than all of us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's three successes and one failure with the red.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One failure with the red? You crack through, but some of the wood splinters and gets lodged and you're going to spend a minute trying to pull some chunks of wood out of your fist. That was a good shot, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pop him off, Ozzy Osbourne-style.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've got to catch the rat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I catch the rat and I eat it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How are you going to catch the rat?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How am I going to catch it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How are you going to catch it? Gotta catch 'em all!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do rats like-- hmm. What do rats like?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They like Disney films. Cheese. Amazon gift cards.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think they really like cheese very much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do little rat scratches on the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to do Pirates of the Caribbean? Let's give you manipulation animal ken.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can manipulate animal ken!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're just so hungry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come here, you little fucker. Three successes, two failures. One failure on red.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One failure on red? You grab it. You take a bite. You're going to lose one of those red die, but you are going to feel a little nauseous about this whole process.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I'm in a coffin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are in a coffin. I'm amused by the throwing of the dice. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you got a second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I listen out to see if I hear anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You hear someone claiming to be an internet celebrity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I start going: Sam! Sam, it's me! It's Matt!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, is that you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's me!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What has happened to us?! All I see is wood! Have we gone inside Wyrmwood?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like I should be able to bleed you for that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there any kind of lock? I have it open a crack; I can't feel any?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no lock, no. It was just sealed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to shove it over to the side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd like to rap a song with my knuckles on the wood to try to get somebody's attention.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're starting to hear that you're obviously in a small group together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can also sort of hear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sam?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sam!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Matt?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Marisha?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dad?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Rocky! You've managed to make your way out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I made it out first?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can crawl out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I see anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you see my fingers?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You take a look and you're on a set.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay! Max!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (shushing) Guys! I'm outside the boxes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Baby! Do you see my fingers?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't see their fingers, but you do see you're on a set. It looks pretty familiar. It might be the Nerdist set.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The fuck?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did Nerdist turn us into vampires?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hasn't it turned us all into vampires?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucking Chobot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can see some of the wood has started to give a little bit and you can hear the tapping coming from the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sam! Quit yelling like a little bitch!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Travis!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I find my way to-- Is that Liam?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, sit tight. Can I find my way to Laura's sound?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Baby!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Baby! Help!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, you're married.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You guys are fucked. Can I try and smash through the floor?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure, give me a strength brawl.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Strength brawl? You are so kind! Give me one more of these things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There better be a lot of successes in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There are. There are five successes and two failures. None on red.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Yeah. Practically like Bruce Lee, you punch down and the floor splinters open and there's Laura Bailey with blood all over her face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! Shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I ate a rat, baby!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did what?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I ate a rat!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You ate a rat?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It wasn't because I punched through the floor?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You could have lied and I wouldn't have known that! Ugh, god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was really hungry! I'm sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there any left?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, there's a little bit of rat left, but it's just the butt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's rat butt, man. Even a vampire has some standards.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can somebody get me out of wherever the fuck it is I am?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Quick note: we could get out of here and leave everybody else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't do that!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can hear you, dick!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're making a lot of assumptions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's get everyone else out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now we all know how you feel about us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm here, Sam!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can hear you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go get Liam and Sam, you get Matt and Marisha.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to try to open Matt and Marisha.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Give me either strength brawl or strength melee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do this, Laura!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks! I'll try!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me know if you need help pushing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a rat in here with me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You should eat it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three successes, two failures. The success was on the red.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It goes all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! I'm getting her out first!

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Help me get Matt out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Matt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm confused. Oh yeah, they're yelling for each other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at all your lipstick on your--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know! This is why you don't do this on a daily basis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On your X I rolled five successes and two failures, but none on the red.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep, that does it. It doesn't go well, but you get it open.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, five/two, that's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You all right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is my face okay?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It looks a little fucked up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It feels weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could leave right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Liam does not look healthy. He looks almost like everything froze and cracked, like he was wearing a plaster mask that started to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck happened to you?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You look really weird.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That makes me sad!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't worry about it. You know what? It's the lighting in here; it's super low. Let's get everybody else out first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should eat a rat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The fuck are you talking about?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just saying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's real good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we try to pry open Matt's coffin?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam, is that you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would recommend leaving Sam, but yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, we double-team it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can roll together and we can add all of your successes together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's also a thing, I'm going to remind you, you can do if you really don't like your roll, although I would save this for later, you can spend a willpower and reroll all the dice you don't like. But then your willpower goes down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, I got a ten! Ooh, I got two tens!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two tens. You hop over to Matt's little X. Oh, failures?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One's an X-ed-out X. One on the red.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So you walk over to Matt's little X and you kick down real hard and you go straight through all the way down to the bottom. He's fine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I spit bits of rat right up into your face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I definitely also rolled a bunch of failures with only one success and a failure was on the red.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was it a

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a four.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as it's not a one, it doesn't matter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A failure is a one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A failure is a one on a

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And a success is--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six and above.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But a

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you don't have to worry about anything other than--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so sorry, sweetheart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay! Where's Sam?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You look all right, though! I mean, you look--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He looks all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You look as bad as we do, but okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you for having Sam send you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You guys look like maybe you've been clubbing. You're a little pale.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sam?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shouting) Yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scream like a baby some more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (wailing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, cool. Can we find our way over to the baby screams?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Was going to say, yeah, pick which baby, but yeah, no, that'll work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Liam, you want to help me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, of course. Sam, are you okay in there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shouting) I'm worried about my nanny! When I was playing, I had a nanny watching the kids, I've got to get home to the kids!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is anybody wearing a watch?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, Charlie!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we have our iPhones on us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You do not have your phones on you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll get you out of there and we'll figure it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I go to the nearest surface and see if there's a dust layer?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to actually take a look around, maybe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to take a look around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's get Sam out first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While they get Sam out, I'm going to look around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't you do a perception awareness roll?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Strength and brawl is what he told me last time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And brawl? Here comes my two big dice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have one red fail, and one, two, three, four successes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got a ten and a seven on the red ones.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Man, you heard another rat rolling around, and you're eyeing it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the coffin? Or just on the floor?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not everyone has eaten a rat yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think there's one more rat around, you should go looking for that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to go look for the sound of that rat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like I need a rat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're kind of refreshing. Don't judge, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm judging you hard. Real hard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are in a survival situation!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What? We're in the studio! I mean, it's a little fucked up, but I rolled a ten and a seven, did we get Sam out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A ten and a seven? Yeah, that'll do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know there's not good crafty!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam! Husband, are you okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm fine! Hey, that was a tough night, but I'm sorry, are you okay?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a process.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry I told you that you look like shit right after everything happened. I didn't think about it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm used to that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the most WB Vampire since the WB Vampires.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Two successes to look around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Including a giant sign on the wall painted in blood that says "Something is wrong."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like familiar handwriting?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. To be fair, with the size of the palette, it looks a little bit like fingerpainting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it look like it was deliberate, or like it was part of the Thrashtopia set?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's way too good-looking to be part of the Thrashtopia set.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's in Papyrus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys, someone took their time to tell us that something is wrong.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course something is wrong! Look at us! Do we have fangs?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How would you know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm looking at them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a little dark, Liam does not look okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to look for the lights.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go over to the green lights and see if I can screw them in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A bunch of them are broken. And it looks like they've been smashed, all of the furniture, the table and the two chairs in that section have been completely thrashed up and broken up. There's damage everywhere. It looks like a riot came through here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to drag my hand through the writing on the wall, to make sure that it's fake blood like syrup.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like, maple syrup and chocolate syrup?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's right, it's food, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's maple syrup.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it taste like maple syrup?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much do you taste?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (lip smacking) Just my fingers, three fingers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop sticking your fingers in your mouth!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Try again? Give me one of your blood tokens. It's not maple syrup, but it tastes better than anything that you've ever experienced in your entire life, you feel great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I wipe a letter off the wall, and finish that off then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just one. That's all you're getting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's fine, that's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you doing? Oh, sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But you're hungry, you're all hungry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to slowly push open the door that leads to the hallway just outside of the set.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So are you going to push towards the Twitch studio, or push towards the hallway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, sorry, closer to the Twitch studio.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Towards the Twitch studio.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The big body doors? The big stage doors?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You sadly can't quite get to it because there are piles of film memorabilia, there's a Power Ranger helmet, there's a Foosball table, it is just--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grab that fucking helmet, it is worth some money.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not in the condition it's in!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Based on her recommendation, I grab the helmet and put it on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I bend down and see if there's any of our stunt swords, or can I snap off a chair leg and arm myself?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can snap off a chair leg, that's okay, give me a strength athletics, I suppose. I'm still getting used to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I keep looking for that rat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, well, a perception investigation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two successes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah, it snaps right off, you've got a broken chair leg.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seeing Marisha do that, I'm going to find any XLR cable on the floor I can find.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't even have to roll for that, it's everywhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to use it as a whip if I need to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll work great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three of three, including one crit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, three and three including one crit? Boy, do you find that rat. Suddenly--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Rats have paper?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Rats are made of paper.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which one did I hand you again?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Auspex, heightened awareness.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Boy, you

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go right after it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You catch it, and are you going to give it a bite?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to give it a good little (snarls).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: By the way, your hunger level's however many red dice you have right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There should be some stunt weapons--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not on the Nerdist set, they're not that cool. Sorry, I'm going to be throwing so much shade, it's going to be really bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But there's a closet right outside of the stage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to have to maybe--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go to the hallway door?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can check to see if it'll open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try and get into the hallway door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going to be--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stealthy about it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going to try and be stealthy about it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try and be stealthy about opening the door. Quietly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Super stealthy. How quietly are you going to open the door?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So quietly? Super quietly? I'm going to take a really long time pushing that little bar in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, give me a dex stealth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Whoa! Double zeroes, crit. And all successes. Everything was a success.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You start to vanish as you're pushing the door, you're get a little--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. How do I use this, what do I do with this?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't know how this shit works.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. So I can open the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can open the door very quietly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, we're going to find a phone, we're going to call your nanny. You and I will get out of here, we'll get to your place, we'll get you home, and then I'll go home.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, yeah. Amy must be worried.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would assume.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The lights in the hallway are flickering. They're not working well. They've got that weird fluorescent crackle when things are left to go to rot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we hear any voices at all?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can hear the hum of the server room right across from you. And some sort of squishy sound coming from the server room. There's some sort of awful (squishy noises).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's foul. I'm going to go check it out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where'd Laura go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Are you okay?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel funny. I'm really hungry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, maybe they have leftover, what did we have, Greek?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it was like breakfast pizza and gyros?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it was Chinese!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we had Chinese.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe they have some leftover Chinese.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While they're having this conversation, I walk over in my Power Ranger helmet and follow behind Marisha and where Laura might be, because I have no idea where she is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, babe, we should look out for those Warcraft props.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Those might also be worth some money.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I literally have their location written in my notes, that makes me so happy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we wanted to head to the kitchen, is that the same direction they're going?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's dark in the kitchen, but you can't quite tell what's happening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's try and get to the kitchen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't want to check out the server room?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we've got to go that way anyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everyone roll a dex stealth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I have to roll dex stealth?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Since you did so well, I'm going to let you walk one through, although that's not quite how it works.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really? Should I do it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'll let you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Crit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, I got two tens! Same thing!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh you got two tens, he got two tens as well!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two tens? All right!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And the rest are successes.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MATT
lines.text: Two successes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One success.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You guys make a little bit of noise, and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Isn't a crit two tens?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A crit is two tens.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: --there's noise, there are things. You don't see anybody, but you can hear stuff moving around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's probably Sean, he works so late.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So the big door, the big door for the Twitch studio.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You mean that door over there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, yes, as long as you're not pointing in the game, because then you're pointing at the front, but if you're pointing at the table, then yeah, that's the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, she's Laura, she's not Laura. She's Laura, not Laura.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (creepy ambient sound, repeating "Where are you?")

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Where are you," did you hear that?! Creepy! Ugh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, there's some weird sounds coming from everywhere, but there's a big, bloody sign written on the main door to the Twitch stage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it say, "Things are getting creepy?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it say, "Is it Thursday yet?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It says, "I was born in a box, how do I end?" With a question mark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait a minute, does that mean other people came out of coffins, too?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And below it is a circle that's been drawn in blood, and set into four corners. In one corner is a heart, in another corner there's a face, in the other corner is a glowing sun, and in the other corner is a cross with a circle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a box?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a circle, cut in four. With a heart, a head, a sun, and a cross.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are the Warcraft weapons?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they in the stock closet, in the closet that's got the props?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They might be in the prop closet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right, does anybody actually have a card key that gives them access to the prop closet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet Marisha does!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's on Sean's desk. I've got to get to the desk, I've got to get to my office.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll come with you to the office.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it as we remember it, or is there debris everywhere?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Foosball table is missing, the couch has been overturned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there Lucky Charms in the cabinet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are in fact, for some strange reason, Lucky Charms in the cabinet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try to eat some Lucky Charms?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They taste like rat droppings. You can still taste them. It's the worst thing ever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Even the marshmallows?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The marshmallows are like fuzzy bits of lint inside of rat droppings, I'm so sorry. It doesn't taste right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's the matter with you, you love Lucky Charms!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sadly) I love Lucky Charms. These taste like shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are they old?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think that's what it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're crazy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They taste like shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ugh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's make our way to Sean's office.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Reroll stealth before you do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Trying to be careful as we go past the server room glass window.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was it again? Dex and--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stealth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dex stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's one success!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just one. I'm not very stealthy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Double failures. On the red.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everything else was a success though!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Doesn't matter!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, everything else was real good!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just like the end of the Vox Machina story! Goodbye!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's your current hunger?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's got two dice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, two, yeah. They both were ones. The red ones were ones.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, your forehead starts to elongate a little bit, and your eyes begin to glow, you start to kind of have a little bit of a twitch, and you're getting a little feral.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see my reflection in the server room window?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not a server.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean that's not--? What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whatever's in the server room, it doesn't quite look like a server.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it still look like a big, fatty computer?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If they made them out of meat.

lines.name: MATT, TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Meat computer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gross!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's probably MSI.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Normally I wouldn't do this on this, but it's amusing me. So even though this was a failure, I figure I may as well hit that now since you started to change. The server is pulsating and thwapping against the window like it's trying to get out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do we see any discernable features beyond being a mass of flesh?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How close to the window--? Make a perception roll into the window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're trying to say on the other side of the hallway as we creep by. Just perception?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can do perception investigation, if you like, or perception awareness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three successes and one failure on the red die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One failure on the red die? You are suddenly panicked when you realize-- you get distracted for looking in the room when you realize that you can see Marisha's reflection, but you don't see yours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know what this means!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Babe! This is some Buffy shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty fucking cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look how awesome! Do I look cool?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty badass. I got to take a picture, but I see my phone's not there. I'm like: Oh shit, sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Suddenly, the door to the server room bursts open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we hear it in the kitchen?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It flies open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit! I go running to see what the noise is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As you stop, you see Dani Carr.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dani!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With a big smile on her face. A very big smile on the face. And a tea set! And she ignores you and takes the tea over into the Geek & Sundry bullpen, humming a little tune as the door shuts behind her with whatever's writhing and wriggling in there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, did she us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She didn't seem to acknowledge you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She came out of the server room and went into Nerdist?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everything looked a little thinned and darkened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha, I think we're all fucked up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck happened to Marisha's face?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, isn't it awesome?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To the bullpen. To the Geek & Sundry bullpen to Marisha and Sean's office in the back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to follow her. Dani!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How close are you going to get?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got to get the key card, so I'll go with you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 30 feet behind. D?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Continuing my mission.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dani?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The lights, again, are all a little iffy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've never fucking drank tea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you're crawling in that direction, you can definitely start taking a look around and see what's up there as I find my bullpen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't remember exactly what's in the Nerdist offices, but it's full of shit. Is there anything I could grab as a weapon?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Other than a commemorative Chun Li statue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm taking it.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Those are heavy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can I look for social's, Chris' sword that he always attacks people with?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The foam one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The foam one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going into the Geek & Sundry bullpen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To look for that, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Chris is in the bullpen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I go: Chris, give me your foam sword!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Chris is ignoring you. Chris is sitting at his desk and his eyes have sunken all the way almost into the back of his head. His mouth is very terse and he's wearing a sign and he's working on the socials. You also see that the window has been blocked and covered.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do they look like us, or do they look like--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They look like people wearing some weird makeup who are very dehydrated and they're all wearing signs around their neck and really trying hard--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Signs around their neck?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going in enough to see it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! I was going to go bug him and: Chris! What's wrong with you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As far as you can see so far, between Chris, Sax, Arcade, and Audrey, they are all occasionally making eye contact with you, but not really keeping it, and they're all wearing signs that say "Drink Me."

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They are terrified. Is anybody above a hunger three right now? Three or above? Do you have three red dice, or is everybody at least at two?

lines.name: MATT, LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: One.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They smell weirdly good. There's an almost candied sensation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do they smell like Lucky Charms?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They smell like the first bowl of Lucky Charms you ever had in your life. They are all sitting at their desks, either working or pretending to work, it's hard to tell. Dani comes bursting out of the office without a tea tray, sits down at her desk and meets your gaze.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who did she deliver tea to?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dani?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yeah?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's going on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Oh, you're all awake! That's great."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dani. Sean doesn't drink tea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Sean doesn't drink tea, that's true."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is Sean in there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "No. No, Sean's working on the server."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh. How long were we sleeping?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Who can say? That's just a matter of opinion, that could be anything. I'd have to ask "upstairs. I could write an email!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know what's going on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Of course! Of course I know what's going on; that's my job. I know what's going on."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why were we in the coffins?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I don't understand the question. That's odd."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who did you give the tea to?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Oh, they're having a creative meeting right now."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's they?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "The creative team."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why the fuck didn't I get an email?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You were in a coffin, dude, you might have gotten an email.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this a Geek & Sundry thing or an LDN thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Well, ask me no more questions, and I'll tell you no more lies!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make my way out of the bullpen, back towards the server room?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I approach the server room window?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I look inside?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Give me a perception investigation because you don't have an awareness issue.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god. Three successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That thing in there is definitely meat and it's some sort of weird-- it's built out of a lot of different things and it seems to be interconnected to something that goes up higher into the building. It's part of some sort of machine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I smell anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It smells kind of good. Not great, but it smells pretty good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But it's locked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't see Sean anywhere?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not that you can tell. How well and intimately do you know Sean? Could you recognize him by just parts? You don't see his head anywhere, I'll go that far.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've seen his head.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Man, I warned y'all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I know!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is this an amalgamation of many parts, or it one giant, pulsating Tetsuo type thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I was picturing a big flesh blob, but it's body parts?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, if you look really closely you tell that there's parts that were not ground up appropriately and are definitely--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ground up?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Chris, give your sword! I shake him. Give me your sword!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Chris is frozen with fear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I look around for the sword.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is a foam sword by his--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I take it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He almost tells you not to take it, and then thinks better of it when Dani looks at him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I set Chun Li down on Dani's desk. Dani, we're going to get the fuck out of here, and we're going to take you with us. You need to tell me what the fuck is going on so we can work together to get the fuck out!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "We won't know what's going on until the creative meeting is over. You would have to talk "to them."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are talking like a crazy person!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go in the creative meeting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're in my office.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's no writing or sign on the door that says, "Drive-Thru"?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You go into the creative meeting?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You walk in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck it. I pick up Chun Li and I back her up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Inside are Eric, and I think it's Matt Key. Eric's sitting on the little green grass carpet. They've got the tea set out. There's a couple different tea cups and he's sitting there having a sip of tea. Weirdly, Whitney Moore is sitting there with him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it look normal in here? They're not, but the room?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's large black circles around their eyes and their mouths are blackened over in this very weird gray puffy mold. It's almost like there's a mold around their mouths and eyes. In the corner is Matt Key, who is working on an iPad, but it's only the arm and the head of Matt Key. He seems to have sprouted spores. There's an old, flowering pile of gray mushrooms that still have Matt Key's face and hand as he's working in the corner that has crawled up and covered the window. Eric and Whitney see you come in and go, "Oh thank god, "Marisha, we've been waiting. It has been very weird. Come down, have some tea, it's just what "you need." As they sit and drink tea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there any telephones around, Taliesin?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you ever seen a telephone in this place?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's Taliesin?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There was an extra hole in the ground and I was already broken open. That's all I'm going to say. They're giggling a lot and they're talking about "Dad." "Dad's coming back any second "now. Dad has plans. Have some tea. We'll explain everything."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't have the tea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this a coup? Is Taliesin taking over? What did Taliesin do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's Taliesin?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There was a hole.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Taliesin was here. Taliesin left. He went to go deal with something. But Taliesin was here."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which way did he go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Out."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Outside? Should we leave? Let's leave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to walk towards the front door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm joining Laura.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to walk towards the front door?

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before they do that, because I saw my lack of a reflection. Is it day or night outside?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't know. You actually haven't seen a working window yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're all blocked?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So far!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of us might be sensitive to sunlight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I point. Marisha's probably still back in the office. You saw Marisha's face?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eric and Whitney see you do this and laugh their ass off. And then, "Key! Key! Put that "in, put that in, that's great! That's great! Aw, Matt! Matt! Genius! No, we're going to use that!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I never get this kind of positive feedback, I'm actually liking this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Key. Key, buddy. You doing all right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Key has a smile and he's writing everything down. He's just iPad-ing, "Key. Key, "buddy. You doing all right?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go look over Key's shoulder, look at his iPad. Scroll up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dexterity dodge. Let's get weird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure! All successes except for one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All successes except for one? He's been writing down everything the two of them have said.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there anything that we have said further up in the document?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, it's all there. He's taken down every note of everything he can hear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Including when we weren't in the room?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. It's a creative meeting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Key. Buddy. I voice Doctor Strange. You love Doctor Strange! Key!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He writes, "I voice Doctor Strange. I love Doctor Strange. Key!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I poke his face a little bit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's gray and weird looking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to poke it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Roll stanima.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA, MATT
lines.text: Stanima?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stamina. Roll stanima. What am I going to add to that? Just roll stanima--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh shite.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think he thinks it's "stanima"!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't say it right, I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not on the red one, but the non-red is a failure-- Two failures, and the red one is a success.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So just a failure on the one--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Failure on the non-reds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing. This is going to sound weird, roll charisma persuasion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where the frig is persuasion? Where is it? There it is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's still tea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Four failures, the red is a nine, and a non-red success.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It doesn't matter where a failure is, just tell me the number of successes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two successes, one of which is on a red.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, and the other red didn't hit a one? It doesn't matter failures, it's just successes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I only have one red die, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a thing for this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I smell my finger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gross. Why are you licking and smelling your fingers?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've known me for so long.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got a piece of paper.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Key actually twitches and you hear this snap of a whole bunch of mushrooms and spores as his neck (clicks). There's a little puff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does the spore puff do anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Were you close enough to sniff it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was leaning over his shoulder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, you were.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "We're going to add that in. It's going to be great."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you aware this is not a normal situation right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Oh yeah, we have Alpha money. We've never had this kind of money before. They're "letting us do so much." Did you sniff the snorts? Spores. (mispronouncing) Sniff the spores? Sniff the s'mores?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, did I sniff the spores?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There were s'mores, but-- Roll stanima, just tell me what happens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just straight stanima?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Feels good to be on the other end of this, doesn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. But I feel for you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Smell the siggle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine. Nothing weird. You do notice that the tea they're pouring is red. And it smells pretty good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's blood! I'm so thirsty. Okay, I sit down on the grass. Is Arwen here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No Arwen. Probably for the best, because I'm not that, you know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have some tea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So as you sip the tea, Eric and Whitney giggle, talk, and make notes. "There's a big thing "happening tonight. There's going to be a big new change to the show. And as soon as we get that "little lock problem off of the Twitch stage, everything will be great. We've been trying to "figure out how to open the Twitch stage, and there's a little lock, and he's very excited for "you to figure out his little puzzle. He says it shouldn't be too hard for people like you to "figure out."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you've been talking to the lock.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "We've been talking to Father. Father has been helping us redesign the show, it's going "to be really good."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, is Father Father his full name? Like first name, Father, last name, Father?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "No. (giggling) No, he's very excited, though. He's very excited for you to figure out "his little riddle. It's going to be good. You should figure out his riddle. Can we help you? I "mean, I know you're not supposed to be in this meeting. We're really thankful that you're here, but--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's my fucking office, bitches.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Sure, but we kind of had the room?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Try the tea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've been drinking the tea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a little bitter. It's good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it's like mushroom blood tea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not getting dosed, am I? That would suck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll find out, won't we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we make it to the front door yet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're hustling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to hustle? As you turn the corner to the front door--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, Eric, did you get your suit for the wedding?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's definitely a flesh suit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course it is. As you turn the corner, Lego Hardwick has been propped up in front of a red velvet curtain, with a sign that's blocking off the whole front.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does the sign say?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It says "Your funeral."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's not ominous at all, from a giant Lego Hardwick.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Somehow he looks less creepy. I'm not entirely sure how they pulled that off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think it's because Matt said we're light sensitive?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe. Do you want to peek out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can try. Do you want to do it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll hold you so if you cry out in pain, I'll pull you back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Matt, really quickly, roll a wits and willpower.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taliesin, Laura's going to peek out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sam's going to hold onto my back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hold on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a good roll for me. That is a crit success, with six successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You felt a weird push towards that curtain that you can't quite identify. That was very odd. That's very strange.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll go first! I just want to see, I'm really interested.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you said we could be light sensitive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have a good mind for these things, and you know what? My intuition's telling me that I go first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're acting really weird, Matt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He gets just far enough to grab his hand onto the curtain, and a beam of daylight comes streaking right through and hits you square in the head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he cry out in pain or anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He doesn't cry out. No, nothing happens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it hurt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Am I fine? Does it hurt me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Slowly, the two halves of you separate at the head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I pull him back!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to squish his halves together and hold him together!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (shouting)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We always knew you'd be the first to go in the apocalypse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're dead already?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's literally a pile of ash? Clothes, anything, just ash?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just ash.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (shouting) Pick up the ashes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm picking up the ashes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (shouting) Marisha's going to be so upset!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what to do, I'm putting them in our pockets!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why are you always the one who picks up the ashes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Marisha, there is nothing funny about this. You shouldn't be laughing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's not out here!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not there! I'm in the office!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're not there? Oh shit. Well you certainly are hearing screaming now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I start crying.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm with Marisha in the office.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're crying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm not crying, I'm freaking the fuck out!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are having the best creative meeting ever, by the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is a great creative meeting. I kind of miss this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god! What are we going to do? Should we tell Marisha?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No! Yes! No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we're alone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm out there with you, I'm by the server.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If he was by the server room he totally would've seen it happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't tell Marisha, they were about to get married!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Meanwhile, back in the office: This is why I never get in the middle of G&S conversations, because you guys have your own language. I never know what you're talking about, and it's best that I just stay out of your way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we bring the ashes with us or do we like put them in a trash bin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is important guys, don't leave that behind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pick up the Power Ranger helmet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not going to help you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we put the ashes in the Power Ranger helmet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, that's so sad!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll pile the ashes in the helmet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe there's a way to undo it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To bring his ashes back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, if we break the magic, everything comes back to normal. That's how these things work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What, do you think this is magic? You don't think we're actually fucking vampires right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you eat a rat a second ago?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I ate a rat! I feel like this is real life! It's not going to go back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You hear thunderous sounds of something being tossed around really violently upstairs, like somebody is doing demolition up there and then it suddenly stops.
