You can see, from your vantage point, everyone in the front office of Geek & Sundry looks up. And then goes right back to work, like trying to pretend that nothing happened.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pop out of the office--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You do not get that far. Do you try and stand up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah? I was going to go talk to Dani.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, you drank the tea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. What did we learn about drinking the tea?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, it looked real good. You said it looked bloody. I'm real thirsty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will also say: while it is not sun tea, it is Sean tea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ashanti about a Sean tea?.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's made of Sean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is made of Sean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, you mean it's

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With a hint of mushroom for flavor. As you go to stand up from the grass, you notice that--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shouting) I'm drinking my best friend's essence! That's gross!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your legs have turned into little mushrooms in the grass. And they're starting to push through your abdomen as well, and come up through your throat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No! I'm going to start scraping them off, if I can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make a stanima-- a stanima roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Just straight, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just kind of a simple one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a failure on the red. No it's not, it's a five, and ones are the only failure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ones are the only fail. There's a big X when you go wrong.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So one success.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The stuff starts sticking to you in a way that you don't like, and it burns a little bit. You probably want to wipe your hands off. And while you were wiping her off, it was starting to go straight through the skin like there was nothing under there other than mushrooms.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's just something I ate. Mushrooms have never sat well with me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (shouting)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (shouting) No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We come barging in: (crying) You guys!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (crying) Marisha, I'm so sorry! He's gone!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What'd you do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's a mushroom.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's a mushroom, look! And I push into her shoulder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (shouting)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh fuck! What happened? We took care of the guy we were with. What'd you do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's Matt?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (shouting) He's in the Power Rangers helmet! (shouting)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Suddenly, Christian bursts into the room. He is covered in blood and says, "Can you "keep it down?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does he smell good?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He does. "You guys are making a lot of noise, and people are trying to work. God!" And he goes back out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to set Matt's helmet down next to Marisha's mushroom head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sun very bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't go out the front door. Don't drink anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't drink the tea! She drank the tea!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we get a refund on the wedding gift?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I literally just bought a new suit. It's a good suit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it an automatic refund thing, or do we have to apply for it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Take my safety deposit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I look at Dani? Dani, why are you wearing a sign that says "Drink me"?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, Dani's one of the few who isn't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not wearing a sign. Chris is. Why are you wearing a sign that says "Drink me?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "He said I had to. I'm sorry, I can't--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Father said you had to?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's not in a mood to talk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Father Chris Hardwick?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should kill Chris.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hardwick?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope. This Chris.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Chris, do you want me to kill you? We shouldn't kill Chris.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, just a side note. For their wedding, I bought them a big block of tickets to Hamilton, and they can't use them now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The wedding's done, Liam!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I get that. Would you like to see Hamilton again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Suddenly the creative room stops. All eyes turn to Liam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, if anyone wants to buy them off me, I'll cut you a real good deal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And they slowly start to get up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, what's going on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "You have Hamilton tickets?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, not on me! But I could never tell you where they are if I'm eaten!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whitney and Eric slowly move towards you, and as they open their mouths a little wider, you see that there is nothing in there. It's just a void in their mouths.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to whip Whitney in the face with an XLR cable!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's do dexterity with brawl.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All successes. Three successes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three successes? You get her right in the face. She falls down with a big cut right across her face. This black dust comes poofing out of it like soot. She's giggling on the floor, rolling around in laughter. The whole room starts to bend, glitter, and shift. Everything's getting a little soft in there. Maybe you've been breathing too many of the spores.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like I feel like I'm seeing trails?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How do you feel like you're seeing things? You're either seeing something or you're not. If you're seeing it, it's either real or it isn't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it feel good?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It doesn't feel good. It feels like things are going to turn on you at any second.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to back up, cock my XLR cable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should shut the door. I'm going to shut the office door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got to get Liam out of there!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Liam's in there still?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's up to you if you backed up with everybody.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wherever Sam is, I am now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I kick Eric dead in the chest just for good measure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just for good measure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He was coming after Liam!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's big!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Strength brawl.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just strength?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Strength brawl. Get weird. What's your power again? Okay, never mind. I know what your power is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt and Marisha!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys are so dead!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six successes, no failures.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six successes, no fails? Your foot goes right through the center of him in a big poof of soot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (coughing) I back out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When you pull out, he is again on the ground hiccuping in a laugh and the shoe you were wearing is now a different shoe than you have on your other foot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My shoe changed. I kicked him in the chest and my shoe changed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a Jordan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not a nice shoe. It's definitely a Ross Men's For Less shoe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do Laura and I also see a changed shoe? We all see a changed shoe?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why did his shoe change? Travis, get out of the fucking room!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that your vampire power?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got out of it, though! His chest gives you new shoes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm shutting the door now and I'm grabbing a chair and I'm putting it in the thing to block the office.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dani's looking at all of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is she still sitting down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dani, this is messed up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I agree."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Matt and Marisha are dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yes, I know."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dani, show me your hands!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Jazz hands."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Open your mouth. Can I see anything? Is there a void?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not at the moment. Her eyes do have the weird little mold. There's a little bit of the mold, the closer you look, the lips and eyes, little bit of the gray mold going on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dani, did you eat mushrooms?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't kill anyone! I just whipped somebody in the face and they laughed!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I kicked Eric's chest out and he started laughing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dani goes into her desk and she pulls out a key card for you all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks. What is this for?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And a little wooden stake. She's like, "You should probably get going, there's a lot of "work to do if you're going to make it to the Twitch show on time." She goes back to working on her unpowered laptop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unpowered laptop. Just black screen?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everybody's is black screens.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's typing furiously?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everybody's typing on nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is really weird, you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey. Should we bring one of these "Drink Me" guys with us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In case we want to drink them? Or feed them to somebody else?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a decoy. No offense, Chris.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We hit them, they fucked with our brains.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not the "Drink Me" ones.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They don't have as much of the-- they're still there, they're not giggling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Chris, do you want to come with us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about you, Arcade?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, Arcade, are you good?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Arcade's trying to not even look at you guys. There's another huge thump above from the offices above and the sounds of knives scraping into walls and glass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to glamor him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What power do you have right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Power? I don't have power; I'm going to try to convince him with the power of my words.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not Scanlan, you're a vampire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't know that. We're all a bit of our characters.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He burns. Bursts into flame. (yelling) Oh god, he rolled something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I watched True Blood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Something feels weird, but it doesn't quite work right. You don't know what you felt, but you felt a little vibration.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A good vibration?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) It's a good vibration!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can feel it! It felt good?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you felt a little twitch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I'm going to do it again. I'm going to yell at him. You're nothing without us! We keep the lights on in this place! Come with us!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He looks afraid, but he's cowering a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sam, be nice to him, he's a really cool guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what I'm doing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go over to Arcade and put my hand on his shoulder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What am I going to do? Roll a d10.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just 1d10?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many red do you have right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll a d10.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh. I rolled a three. So close.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have a moment when you touch him where you really think about tearing right into that throat. Your fangs start to grow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You all right, La? Why are you--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Arcade looks really good is all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You need chapstick?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to come with us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which teeth began to grow? The buck teeth or the canines?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bit of both.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Upstairs, maybe? Are we going to the Twitch set? I don't know. What's happening upstairs?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "You don't want to go upstairs."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should go to the Twitch set.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go to the Twitch set. Come on, let's go. It'll be so much fun. Come on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can try and drag him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want to go to the Twitch set?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I want to stay here."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fine, we'll leave him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm pulling Sam away for a minute.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whispering. Listen to me. Those guys, I love them, but they're married and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's married? Oh, Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Baby! Look at my teeth!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you saying?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm saying that you and me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: An alliance?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are my best friend! They are my best friends, but they're married!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll actually use my heightened senses.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the roll for that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I see hunger roll is perception plus investigation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, if shit goes down, I'll help you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Liam's whispering and Sam's talking in a normal voice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To be fair, I'm going to let you have this. You can hear all of this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just saying if things go pear-shaped, I got you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're saying if things go pear-shaped, they're going to fuck us and take care of each other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You dicks!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we didn't say that! We said that we would look out for each other.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Travis, I have a gift for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you're hungry! You're getting hungrier! We should get out of this room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do we know? There's some sort of Twitch performance that we have to get to. There's a Twitch show, there's something upstairs, there's weird shit on the walls being written. Do we know what that is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We definitely can't leave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not until the sun sets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt's dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Marisha's dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Marisha's a spore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't know where Taliesin is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The wedding is probably not happening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We would be doing so well if Taliesin was here. He would totally know what to do right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The wedding is probably not happening after those two conclusions!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dust and mushrooms. We are marrying dust and mushrooms.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've been to the front door, we've been to the bullpen, we've been to the server room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got to go to the Twitch stage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And there's that area beyond the Twitch stage that I never go into.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, the back area! Let's make our way to the Twitch area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, let's go! Liam!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's up, yes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to the Twitch area!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In a little while, when we come back, we will be going to the Twitch area. You guys are adorable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the heck is happening?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm having fun torturing you all. I've got so many worse things to happen. Guys, thank you for enjoying my attempt to hang onto these rules that I've written down. Things are going to get a little weirder because I'm going to inform of them of a couple new rules that they can now play with since they're starting to vamp out a bit more. Sadly, two of our party are dead and are going to have to not come back to the table.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You all died so fast!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know, I knew that was going to happen, but when the compulsion kicked in I was like: Well, I rolled pretty high.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's in an inside joke that probably 100 people watching our stream right now are like, "Oh, I "know what Matt was." It was kind of cute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lasombra.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing you need to know about until maybe next week. We'll talk about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Guys, thank you so much. I think we're going to have a giveaway for something in the chat and I believe we're going with "Bloodbath." I hope you're enjoying this madness. It's going to get weirder and I hope you enjoy where we're going with all this. We'll be back in a few minutes once we've watered or had other things to drink. We'll see you soon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't burn down the company while I'm dead! [break]

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dude. I get the theming. I'm kind of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to know where it's going.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two nasty little children gone. Four sweet little children left. The winner of our in-chat giveaway is Cloaked_roamer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cloaked_roamer!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Won a Wyrmwood set of ill-repute that I'm not entirely sure of what it is or what it does, but it is a thing and I'm far too nervous trying to run this game with all of these papers that I'm so glad you can't see--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it wards off Christians.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hope you all are having a good time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am having a great time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a reasonably sized D&D table now. We have a reasonable amount of people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. There's plenty at the side-- I bumped into you!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's put that over our head.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And just to remind you what's painted on the floor when we get there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. I marked that down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you guys hear this whole thing about the clue? There's a riddle. Were you there for that or is that me hearing something that Marisha heard?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you've heard that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you need this back?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here's a heart, sun, bottom left is face, bottom right is a cross in a circle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, she gave us a--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A foam sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A foam sword. No, she gave us the wooden--

lines.name: TALIESIN, LIAM
lines.text: A little wooden stake.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think she may have given you a keycard also. Because she was just--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She was being so kind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And so much good role-playing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm having fun in the most terrifying way possible. Oh man, this is intense. I don't even know if this is a high, I'm not sure what this is. This is jumping out of an airplane without a parachute, but knowing that it's foam underneath.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we make our way back to the Twitch stage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So yeah, let's pick back up. For some reason, my volume is--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Snagglepuss voice) Oh, exit stage right, even.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So you make your way back, quietly through the mess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stealthily. We don't want to make noise past the meat mass.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There we are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Snagglepuss voice) Heavens to Murgatroyd.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jesus. I'm going to switch to another one, see what happens. I don't know what any of these audio buttons do, so it's fun for everybody.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When I did my one-shot, I played the same song for 45 minutes so it's just a two minute--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hello?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm reeling it in. It's good. You know, you could probably hear that from somewhere. We'll deal with that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all upstairs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's probably Rachel Romero up from the second floor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Only I know. Don't think I don't have plans. So you make your way. Do you want to go through the hallway or through the Nerdist office?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Through the hallway. I feel like the Nerdist office-- I just feel like it's going to be here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, can I quickly admit that I don't know the layout of the building at all?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Some people know this, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know the difference between--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have the blueprints to the whole building right here. I know where every window is; I know where every office is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And avoid the server room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Half the people you've talked about I've never heard of.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Definitely the safest way back to the Twitch stage is through the Nerdist office. Sam, you should lead us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Sure. Which way do I go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just right through this long passageway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm at the tip of the spear, I've got my whip. I'm going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sure there's something heavy that I can grab and use as a weapon in the Nerdist office.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Make a perception investigation roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I do the same?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Anybody who wants to make perception investigation roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it just perception?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perception plus investigation, which is right below it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, three successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That will do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. I rolled a failure. On the red.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's your hunger level?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is the only one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just the only one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take a red die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not for one. You get distracted going through people's stuff and you're going to get left a little behind. You'll be at the back of the line by the time this is done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I see anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three successes? No, you didn't find anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got distracted, you're left behind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've found it. I'll tell you what you did find. You found a Playstation VR system. But

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're getting pink eye from that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know how you get pink eye?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was already a little iffy, but it's definitely not been happy for the past however long it has been.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Poop in the eye, yeah?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like Lucky Charms.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's Travis doing right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He was wandering-- he went into the corner, to Elise's desk and he found underneath her desk something that will do. It's a replica knife that seems to be pretty solid. It's a Lord of the Rings replica elf knife. It's not exactly sharp, but it will do the trick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is sick. And I'm sorry and I use Presence: Awe to say, you really need to keep me safe so I can get us out of here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, you're going for that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Roll a d10.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Just one. So it's not charisma plus persuasion?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So what's your roll? I mean, what's your--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Charisma and persuasion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it's just straight-up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what it says. Hunger or charisma plus persuasion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me double check just because I'm learning how these powers work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. I'll find it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just playing with the Pink Eye system.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the scariest thing yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you putting it on your face? It could protect your eyes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And what's your roll for that? Four?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a four on the d10.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make a intelligence versus willpower roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So what's the versus mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh. Just intelligence and willpower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A single d10 or-- so I roll too? Charisma plus persuasion?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you roll that. Charisma plus persuasion. I'm making this a versus because normally, it's not. But this is weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So this is the intelligence one. And that's two successes and the willpower is two successes. And a failure, but not a red.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two success. Do you want to burn a willpower to reroll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Reroll everything you don't like and burn a willpower.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's four successes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five successes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! You got to mark off that willpower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's your bro, man. And also, take an extra die. You're here to keep everybody safe but you're--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey man. You are actually the person I'm most concerned about, so you stay close to me. I'll keep you safe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm an idiot, but they do. So you keep me alive, obviously. So you keep

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look what I found!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm playing Resident Evil.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On the VR?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing of event walking through here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Through the Nerdist office? Nothing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go. Let's keep going. To the Twitch stage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're at the door. There's the big circle. You're in the kitchen again. There's the big circle on the floor and there's the bloody sign on the big door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god! The farmer jumped out! Oh, you guys, have you played this? Oh my god, you guys!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this a portable system? How does this work?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wired.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I already took it off, dick. And you're in the kitchen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The funniest thing of course is there's prob-- well no, I guess there would be a little power to it. It's probably pretty glitchy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It doesn't really work. None of the laptops worked. You were playing with nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm crazy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "How do I end?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, this is obviously some sort of puzzle, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a riddle, this is a puzzle. We've got three clues so far. I was born in a box. How do I end?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, Matt ended and Marisha ended.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something is wrong. Right, that was the first thing that we read.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey guys, thanks for leaving me behind in the Nerdist--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it something is the matter or something is wrong?

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Something is wrong.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then also, your funeral. This is a word scramble.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, your funeral is obviously referring to if you go through the curtain, you're dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make an intelligence test. No, just Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. In just a straight--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Straight intelligence test.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: --straight stanima.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, straight intelligence test, you fucker. I have your stats here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. You know me, I've been busy all week. This is not a word scramble. I don't have time for that shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would high-five you right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was born in a box. How do I end?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And there is a circle on the floor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and it's got--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A heart, a sun, a face, a cross in a circle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or a head, or a face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do I end? I was born in a box. How do I end? You end from the sun! So I'm going to stand in the sun.

lines.name: SAM, LIAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the circle or--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I followed you. Nothing happens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Maybe the cross, too, a wooden stake situation? Can't you die from a cross if you're a vampire?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you're a vampire, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aren't we vampires? Look at my teeth!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Those are a problem.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who gets born in a box?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We did! Coffins, dude.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Test-tube babies?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They were born from a tube. Sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was Jesus Christ born in a box? A manger thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No,

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much you overestimate me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When she stood in the sun, did anything happen?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't you take the stake that we were given and stab the heart with it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I take the wooden stake and stab the heart on the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When you put the stake on the ground by the heart, there's this low, bassy thud.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I leave it here or should I back up? What should I do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a good thing. No, this is progress.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I leave it on the ground or should I--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll leave the stake on the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The blood that the heart was drawn with start to turn black and crackle. And it boils there, gently.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. So heart and stake. Not cohesive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very cohesive. It killed the heart.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any more clues around? Do we see any more writing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a big building.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. There's no people out here, right? The "drink me" and "eat me" people were all back in the Nerdist offices, outside the bullpen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't see anybody.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we check the little prop closet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's see if the key card opens the prop closet. Did it work?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The keycard does in fact open the prop closet. It's a very good keycard. That's better than my keycard. Yeah, the prop closet opens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Is there a weapon in here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we turn the light on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can hit the switch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hit the switch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Doesn't turn on. To be fair, you can see okay. You don't see--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do have heightened senses.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Especially if you want to burn a little blood, you can see really well if you're looking for something in particular, but it's the prop closet. It's a ruined, dishevelled mess of ephemera, toys, prop weapons, costumes. It's exactly the way you remember it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I smell anything coming from this room?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, but it is the same smell it's always had, which has been very iffy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing tasty or spicy or interesting? I mean, spicy is the wrong word. It's always spicy in there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. It's whatever you really imagine, the wonderful--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it smell delicious?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's obviously some rats living in here, if you went diving for them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we look for rats? I need a rat. I want to eat a rat again. It was really good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was pretty good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm serious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'll try to look for a rat with her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Do a perception investigation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I go back? I forgot something that I wanted to do. Back at the office, inside the bullpen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You guys are okay here looking for rats, right? I'm going to go with Liam.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can take a look.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Only one success and one failure with the red dice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You find a rubber rat and you bite it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three successes for me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm personally a fan of the taste of rubber rats. I think it's nice and the texture's pretty positive but your tooth gets a little weird. It doesn't feel right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three successes? Ooh, that's pretty solid. You do in fact find a rat hiding behind one of the costume bins and if you want to tear for it, you got to give me a dex melee or dex brawl. Roll for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll do a dex brawl.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Punch that rat. Where are you guys going?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm back at the office, outside the bullpen where the door was shut. Who all's wearing these signs? It was Arcade--

lines.name: TALIESIN, TRAVIS
lines.text: Chris, Arcade.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Audrey was there. Max was there. A couple of people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just one success.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a rat. I'll let you have it for one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I share it with Sam, though?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have to eat the rat all myself? Okay, I eat the rat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many red dice do you have?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It doesn't go away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the sign says what again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Drink me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I tried, I wanted to but it's such a little rat. (slurps)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'd say you're dead to me, but--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't judge. I bite Arcade's neck.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's going to try and fight you off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going to suck Arcade's blood?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He starts to panic and as it is happening, he's going to fight you off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I use Dread Gaze and inspire unbearable immobility.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the roll on that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Charisma plus intimidation versus charisma and willpower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Give me charisma intimidation. And my charisma willpower for my humans. There we are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And failure is a one. So one success. No failures.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's not frozen. He's hiding in the corner.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I grab a couple of t-shirts and I push--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which t-shirts?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The StayTurnt t-shirt and the Dungeon Master t-shirt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for being respectful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I cover his hands up and I say: Can you just give into it? You know, this is terrible for both of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a single tear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know. But it will all be over soon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm standing behind Liam, holding the prop knife to the rest of the room. Is there anybody moving towards Liam?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. I get the distinct impression this has already happened. They know what's going down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, we're through the looking glass here, Arcade. I'm really sorry, but I'm going to try to bite him again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going to go for a bite?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Give me a strength brawl. Let me double-check. Hold on. Actually, strength brawl plus two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Strength brawl? Brawl's nothing. So strength brawl plus two. Okay, it's not good. I got a fail!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got two fails, yo!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two fails! One on the red.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One on the red. He manages to just barely fight you off. He's hidden under the desk now. He's trying to crawl away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck it. I whip around and turn on Chris.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Give me a strength brawl plus two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we eating people? What's happening?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's giving in to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's better. That's two successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. You get one point back. You lose one. Do you want to go any further? Keep drinking or do you want to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) You can't get rid of your other one!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can't get rid of the other one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sure there's a way to do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you always keep one? If I'm okay-ish, I'll hold off. I'll see you later, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's now bleeding from the neck. As he goes back to his-- not pouring, but bleeding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a little coagulant in Liam's spit, at least?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But everybody likes me here, Travis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know they do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you backing out of the room now to join the rest?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any other weapon-y stuff in the room?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not that you can see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anything ridiculous like--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've seen that office. Everything's ridiculous.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm looking for a weapon in the prop closet with the rats.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm helping her and while we're looking I'm telling her--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perception investigation. You can combine your roll if you like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I swing past the office supplies and grab a fistful of pencils.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good call. Perception investigation. As you walk by, you see Dani come walking through the office. She smiles, walks by. You see her go into the office and she says, "Chris, we need you to "help update the server. Come on." And then she walks by, carrying the bleeding Chris over to the server room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What were you going to say, Sam?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm was going to say, I'm feeling very vulnerable. Why don't we form an alliance and if anything goes down, we kick Liam down and we'll run away as fast as we can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we'll also make sure--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sam, do you-- No. I'm just waving this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You also have no idea that I just drained Chris' neck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll make sure Travis is okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course. Yes. But Liam's a goner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, he's a pretty fast runner. I'm probably the slowest out of all of us. I got two tens.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two tens. That's a critical. That is a critical. You have found some World of Warcraft prop swords. See, I did know where they were. I did. There were right here. I know you're not watching, Marisha. I knew where they were. You found some prop stakes, but to be fair, a prop stake is still a piece of wood. That's still stake-y.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many stakes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You found two stakes and you found a very weird silver chalice. It's interesting-looking. Could be something. Could be nothing. No idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I stick that in my belt like I would at a Ren Faire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ren-Faire style.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Did I find a World of Warcraft weapon too?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. It's a big ridiculous sword that would hang on a wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa. Is it made of metal?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's made out of a metal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is way too heavy for me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, what's your strength?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's pretty good. That's a 110 pound-- that's a normal human. You're not quite supernatural, but you could be fine with it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So Liam and I make our way out. Are we sharing with the others what just happened?

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: What just happened?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a bad idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We canvassed the offices and found--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we wanted to find more weapons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I found this dagger! It's not super sharp, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I found a sword!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got a bunch of pencils.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at this big-ass sword I found! Do you want to switch me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe other people are vampires like us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll take the dagger and you take the giant sword?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a good dagger. It's the S-curled one, it's got the nice little--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is really badass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My internal monologue right now is really pissed off that I did not get to taste Arcade.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Things can still get weird. We'll see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you find anything out about the puzzle?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. I forgot we were trying to solve a puzzle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we all look for puzzle clues? Or should we try to do more to the-- that circle on the ground, Taliesin. How big is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's slightly smaller than a children's four-square court.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Big enough that if it opened, we could fit through it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's bled up into the door. It feels like it's some sort of seal against the door itself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh! Wait a minute. Mercer died by the sun, right? Don't we have his ashes in the Power Rangers helmet? I pour the ashes of Mercer onto the sun square.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's really fascinating. The ashes start to mix with-- can't believe you did that. So frustrated. The ashes start to mix with the sun symbol and it starts to boil.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, Marisha died by mushrooms.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could put some mushrooms on the head?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, you didn't bring any of the mushrooms because they looked a little--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He probably still has some on his skin!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He doesn't. He wiped them off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What would heads not like? Wait, suns cause ashes--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Silver! Do we have any silver?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We just found a sword. What if the sword is--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Silver chalice. You have the silver chalice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy fuck. Take notes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did! I had silver chalice written down. I thought I could drink out of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But would silver hurt a head?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you could hit it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus, Matt Key's head was in the office.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Silver is bad for vamp-- does this hurt to hold?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about we continue reconning the bottom of this floor? So who's going to take the audio booth?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's an audio booth here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! It's right over in the corner over there, dude!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you just come from your car right to this table, so there's a whole bunch of areas you don't know about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go in the back offices.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You go in the very back, I'll take the audio booth. Who wants the three bathrooms?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know where the bathrooms are!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My god, we've finally found a part of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you going to go?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll go with Sam, because we got to stick together.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Always.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm the closest, so I'll go into the recording booth area.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll be at the back, all by myself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The recording booth door is locked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, it's locked, so--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want to go to check out the back offices with me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are huge!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can deadlift a house! You can't bust that shit open?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's pretty solid with a fire door. Well, let me try it. Can I back up and try to run through the door?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. You don't have anything fancy for that. Do a strength athletics just for fun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So that loads me up pretty good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a tough door, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a ton of success. That's five successes and no failures.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa. Five successes, Taliesin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) Man, I was really hoping-- well, it's okay. I honestly wanted that door to survive because it's the most obnoxious door in the entire building.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It really is, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the most obnoxious door in the entire building. It's the only one the keycard won't open. I don't know why. But that door comes off its hinges and pops open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy crap!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, CrossFit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It goes flying off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the doorway, with my heightened senses, can I see anything in the darkened room?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah. In the darkened room, you can see in the corner there's two Twitch hosts cuddled up, hiding. They've been down there--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Erika!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's not Erika. It appears to be Amy Dallen and Jody Houser hiding in the corner. Jody has been furiously scribbling because she's afraid she still actually has a deadline if she ever gets out of here. Amy Dallen has been slowly building a little fort out of the computers to stave off whatever it is that's been--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amy? Josie?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jody. Amy and Jody.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jody. Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's okay. I've been doing a lot of Josie lately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you guys okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Travis?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "It's not safe! Shut the-- oh."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I broke the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "There's things out there you don't-- oh, there's bad things out there."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I come in the room?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yeah. Of course."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I walk in the room a little bit. I'm still holding a giant sword.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He needs to be invited in. He's a vampire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't need to be invited in, really.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't? Oh shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm glad you asked, though. It's very polite.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was like, I know this fucking game!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let the right one in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I tuck the sword behind my back real quick?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, they saw it but--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not for you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're hip to what's going on and you do not look like what they're afraid of. They're not afraid of you yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I'm in the little engineering room, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is the booth clear? Is there anything in there? You're sure?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Just food and drinks. That's all we've just--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you mind if I look? Stay right where you are. Please. Don't move. Can I walk over to the door and look through and see what's in the booth?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm. Nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing? Not even food or drinks?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I mean food and drink. They've got a stash of-- they obviously raided a terrible Nerdist shoot for Cheetos and whatever. And, weirdly, yet another box of Lucky Charms. I don't know why we have so many of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Laura! Come in here!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm already in the back office.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit. Can anybody hear me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does anybody--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We went to the bathroom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So depending on how loud you were, they probably couldn't hear you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that wasn't that loud.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We might have faintly heard (muffled noises).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I try to open the booth door?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it opens just fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I peek my head in and look behind the door? Check the corners.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Man! You are nervous!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just make sure it's food and drink.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As far as you can tell, it's just food and drink.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my Aura Perception to see if there is anything else in the room?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the roll for that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It says hunger roll, perception plus empathy minus manipulation plus willpower. No, versus. Manipulation versus plus willpower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or a perception against people, I believe. So who are you running it against? And you can use it to figure out things like what kind of creature someone is, you can get a notion of how they're feeling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let me get a notion of how Amy is feeling since Jody is just writing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's tough to tell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's on the other side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure. Make the roll and I'm going to use my fancy rolls now because things are going to get weird. Have a blood die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I roll three of these, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That one after. I think you get it next roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three successes, no failures.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three successes, no failures? And what's it versus for her?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Manipulation plus willpower.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: I don't like it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is something you do hear, but it's coming from somewhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah. She's scared, but she's been here for a while and it's tough to tell how long and has gone into full fight-or-flight mode and has definitely gone fight. And you definitely get the sense that, and you can read this from her aura, she is human and she has killed something within the last 72 hours. You don't know what.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amy. I'm going to ask you to move back into the booth until we can make sure it's more safe. Can you tell me what you've seen and what you were hiding from?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "There was some creature and something's wrong with Ivan and--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We haven't even seen Ivan yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Daddy Chops.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "There was these things with these large eyes and these vacant mouths and I fought one and "then we've been hiding in here. I don't know how long."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've seen the vacant eyes and mouths as well. We put down two ourselves. They laughed afterwards.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yeah, they do that."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's really disturbing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "It is! I would say it's been a long couple days, except I don't know how long it's been."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I can't promise that it's safe outside of this room and I'm sorry I broke the door. Will you just wait inside the booth?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "How about you put the door back and we'll reinforce it and then knock seven times when "the coast is clear because no one will knock seven times, because that's ridiculous."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's my normal knock, but okay, that sounds fair enough. Can I make a look around the room before I leave for anything that might be used as a weapon? It's pretty bare, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's pretty bare. There's just the desks and a decent rough cut of Thrashtopia rolling on one of the monitors that's flickering.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll pick up the door, back out of the room and pull it back there with the handle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's not feeling it yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where are you at? Three?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. We'll see how we feel in a minute. Cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What happens if you get five hungers?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a great question.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a great question.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to use my Obfuscate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because you have a second-level version, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right. So I can be totally sneaky.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to be super sneaky. You're going to burn a blood for that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. What does that mean? I get another blood?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll a d10. What did you get?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, you get-- actually, this is not the normal rolls. This is me doing terrible things because this is a short game.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get two extra-- I'm so hungry all of a sudden.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You turned practically invisible, but it cost you. So you're going all the way back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Past where we filmed the Slayers' Cake thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Past the library?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Through to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Things start to get very weird back there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm looking for writing, any clues I can find.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So as you turn the corner, the ground starts to slowly get dark and strangely inky. That whole office that you're used to seeing has been cleared and is empty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's nobody in here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a table in the middle of the room. And in the darkness, you can't quite see the walls. It's like you turned the corner and there's a table, almost in a void. And at the table are four people playing cards. It's Ivan. Ivan van Norman is playing cards with Amy Vorpahl and Damion Poitier and Sam. They're all sitting, playing cards. Ivan--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not me Sam. There's another Sam.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, the other Sam.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ivan, Amy, Damion--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everybody else looks a little nervous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do they smell good?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does Ivan smell good?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. It's standing up like he's been shocked, like he's been putting his tongue in a socket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that true of his sideburns as well?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah. They're all the way out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whose back is to me as I'm coming around the corner? I'm assuming they don't see me because I'm--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They don't, and it would be--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ivan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And they're showing the card to Ivan. You can't quite make out what Ivan's saying, but Sam's not having a good time about it and is arguing with the rules for some strange reason. And out of nowhere, a large spider comes out and pulls very quickly Sam entirely away from the table.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? From where?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Into the back corner?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whatever is back there. And then a chair floats into view and rolls up to where Sam was. You just heard screams and a spider clack of (muffled sounds).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's quite a card game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ivan turns. "Amy, you're up."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Ivan seems completely unfazed by it? But everybody else is creeped out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, Ivan's running a game, and it's Amy's turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I sneak around the room so I'm behind Ivan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That might be difficult, but you can give it a try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I going to die?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no roll for that second Obfuscate. You just burn and you do it, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just do it. Oh wait. No, wits and stealth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll a wits stealth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I should have done that earlier!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's okay. This will work just fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I have to use my two news?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have to roll three reds on this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should've taken your head out of your ass, let's go!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, hold on. (counting)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go, vampire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, here we go. Oh my god.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh shit! Two failures.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LIAM
lines.text: On the reds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I got a success!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two failures on the red? All right, this is fun. How hungry are you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was already three and just because I did Obfuscate. It seems a little fucked up that I have to use my new hungers on my power! You didn't have to do that!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Quit blaming other people for your weakness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just saying, it's bullshit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're rules-lawyering a game you barely understand!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, well--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here's the deal: you're going to get seen. But we'll deal with that, because I want you to make a note: you are hangry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm really fucking hungry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Until you feed, you're going to be really on edge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Time for a Taco Hell run.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Amy Vorpahl frighteningly pulls a card, puts it down, closes her eyes. Ivan pulls the card, looks at it, smiles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do they see me yet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not yet. And then Ivan turns to Amy, and Amy... it's like every piece of her rotates 45 degrees against itself. Not like meat, but like glass, and then she shatters like a mirror. And then a new chair pops right up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cleanly? Does blood explode?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's just glass.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fragments? Amy fragments?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it seem like Amy was a vampire before she shattered?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, she smelled pretty good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ivan turns to you, but Damion has not seen you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to walk up behind Damion and bite the shit out of his neck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, you have surprise on him, but not Ivan. Ivan's going to allow it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I figured.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll wits. This is going to be weird. Roll wits and stealth. I'm going to make this a weird one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I just rolled, and it was not good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, try it again. How much are you going to eat him? Are you going to eat him a little, some, or a lot?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) I want to suck his blood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A good amount of it. Not all of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not all of it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One success.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One success?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That didn't count, because that hit paper. Ignore me. Boy, he did not see you coming.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He didn't?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I get to suck his blood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, but only one point worth, because that was not a lot of success.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At least that's something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's very conscious and aware that something is on his neck right now, and he's freaking out. He's going to take a swipe at you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe I'm part of Ivan's game.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's real big.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, he's a big guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He had a lot of blood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's currently wearing my jacket, too, so if you get any blood on my jacket, I'm going to be very upset.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he wearing your jacket because you're dead?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, he's wearing my jacket because I lent it to him at the end of Wednesday Club last week, and I haven't gotten it back yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You smell like Taliesin. Where's Taliesin?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That got weird. Thank you. So I'm figuring out how to do this. He's going to try and kick you off. Roll dex dodge, because he's going to try and take a swipe at you. Dex dodge, and if you want, you can burn willpower to roll the ones you don't like over again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's five. You get four, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three, plus?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dodge. It's four.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything over a six?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One success.

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Burn a will.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't even know what that means!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you see those little will dots? You burn one, and you can reroll any of the dice you like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you marking it off?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And for each willpower, I reroll a dice?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can reroll as many dice as you like on one roll, for one willpower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'll try it, because you're saying to do it. Two more successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all you needed. There's a rule that I forgot, but that's okay. I'll do it next time. I'll remember that. Succeed at a cost. I keep forgetting about succeed at a cost. It's really cool. Yeah, you slap him down, and you're right back in his neck, if you want to do a strength plus two for your vampire fangs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Strength plus two?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, strength plus two dice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get that Big Gulp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (chomping sounds) Ooh. Well, no. No failures, but one success.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One success? You get one more out of him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why did you hit the mouse again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why do you keep hitting my mouse, man?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he's sitting right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you want to keep draining or do you want to back off?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm good. I'm going to let him live.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going to back off or you just let go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to push him forward against the table and back off really quickly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going to push him forward against the table?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. So he doesn't lunge at me as I back up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to let that happen. He slips as you push him towards the table and he leaves his seat and falls off into the darkness. He falls like he fell off a building

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like he can't walk in the darkness like I'm walking?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He was on the table and you pushed off and pushed him off his seat and there's no floor apparently because he just dropped.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoops.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You seem to be standing on it fine, but it didn't work for him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? Ivan, hi.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is great."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You too, man. This looked like a pretty crazy game you're playing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "This is the best one I've put together in quite a while."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I remember Paranoia with you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "That was fun. My whole game has gone to another level. I've had a really-- this has "been a good year. You want to play?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you know what? I think I'm good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I think it could be worth your while."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know what the deal is with that circle out by the Twitch door is?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have talked to so many people."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Oh, yes I have. It's been fascinating."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long has

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) "I feel you haven't earned that kind of information yet. Honestly, I feel that "this whole sneaking-up-on-my-game and trying to like-- honestly, costing Damion his turn. That's "just tacky."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just thought we're on the same side here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "There's no sides. We're all friends and it's just a game. You want to play the game?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I'll make it worth your while. You win a little bit and maybe there'll be some answers in "here for you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It didn't seem like it was possible to win?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Well, here's what I'll say. I have so many cards that could be pulled and the cards they "pulled are already gone--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Travis learned this lesson before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "See, if you think about it though, Travis is really the reason this is happening "right now. The whole theory for this game is because of Travis. You should pull a card. He "really likes it when you pull cards."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I really do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Pulling cards makes the Father happy."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I kind of want to pull a card.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Of course you do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Sit down."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! (laughs) Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will sit down if you answer a question as I sit down and then I'll pull a card.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "It entirely depends on the question."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I sit down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You feel heavy as you sit down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a stupid idea. Marisha sat down and had some tea. She died.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Marisha drank the tea? Oh, he's not going to be happy. Why would she-- that's not smart."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. I wasn't there. I just know that she drank tea and then she turned into a mushroom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yeah, that'll happen."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How come we were put in coffins and turned into vampires and some people are delicious?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Oh, that's really complicated. That's a very complicated question. There's a lot happening "and I'm going to be honest with you. Not all of this was the plan. I specifically get the feeling "that a lot of this has gone a little off-track."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. It seems like it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "It does, doesn't it? I'm doing what I can, but really, what can we do other than trying "to make some good content, you know?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. Yeah. Just waiting for the door to open to the Twitch stage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "That's a cute, clever puzzle. How are you doing on that?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Looking for clues.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "What have you solved so far?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will answer that if you make sure I pull a good card. Beneficial card for me, not for you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Electricity crackles from the back of his spine and seems to make an arcing pattern through the darkness that's almost a circuit breaker. "Oh, heart and sun. Not bad."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He knows things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I'm running a game here. I got to be on top of it. If you're not on top of it, that's how you lose!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) "It's just crazy, the sorts of people you work with here, isn't it?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yeah. He'll be very happy if you take a card. You can yell for people, by the way. There's no "problem. This is a game for everybody."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I did yell for him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How loud?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Travis? About that loud.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's-- I mean, you're way back there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. But I don't know how quiet it is in the building.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And you do have--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do have Heightened Senses! Can I hear her?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How loud?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Travis?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, if you want to be a big girl about it. (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we lower the gain on the mic, though?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, that's fair. "I mean, we can call everybody over if you like."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just feel like he's really going to want to pull a card and I don't know if he should. I feel like maybe, if this is a bad thing, then we'll-- this will be just me and then they will never know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This has been going on for a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pick a card.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (yells)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make a pull.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this one of those magician tricks where you're telling me to pull a certain one and I don't realise it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll say I pulled from the middle before and it was the Void.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is no Void card in this set because this is not a Deck of Many Things. You pulled the Two of Swords. Oh dear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which is?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two of Swords is two bleeds. Suddenly, blood gets sucked straight out of your fingertips through the card into the base.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, I just got rid of these things!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit! Ugh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "That was a rough pull."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, dude. It was.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "But everything has a price and so for that, swords. Swords are about knowledge. So what "do you want to know?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "If I can answer it, I will. I'll find something I can answer."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) The puzzle!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do I solve the-- hmm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "That's too broad."

lines.name: LAURA
