lines.text: What coincides with the picture of the head on the puzzle?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I made too many notes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I still bleeding from my fingertips creepily? All things considered though, this isn't as bad as the spider or the shattering body.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or a horse.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you did okay. So there are--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm holding my hands up so I stop bleeding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They've closed up. The card itself gave you paper cuts and sucked everything out and then they--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hate paper cuts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right on the fingertips, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a surgeon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "You need to find something that expresses that understanding."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That we know that we're vampires, basically?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yes, and you have to prove it now. So you have to find something that proves that you "know that you're vampires, something of intellectual proof of it. Now, I might know where "something is, but that's another question."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think I'm okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've made my way back to the back at this point. Hey. Hey, Ivan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ivan. He's made of electricity now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Things have gotten weird."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I gather.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Baby, I pulled a card.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "It made Father very happy. I think you should pull a card, too."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, but you didn't see what happened with the other cards. There was a giant--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How bad could it be?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Amy rotated like she was made of glass and then shattered. Like gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "That card's only one pull, so that's fine."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Sam got eaten by a giant spider.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "The other Sam."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what, Ivan, I'm a fan of card games. I am.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you sat down, by the way?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I haven't. I'm a fan of card games. I hate to rush into anything too hastily.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so hungry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you don't look so great. Maybe we'll check out the rest of this floor real fast and then I'll come back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Hopefully I'll be here when you get back, but fine."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I get up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "No, I need a player."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you need us to send in Chris or Arcade?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I don't care who you send in. I just need a player."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. Sam?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're in the bathroom, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me Sam?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I think we're in the bathroom, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You just hid in the bathroom the whole time?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I don't know--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we left off of us ages-- a while back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The bathrooms are sadly the bathrooms, except more so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's nothing going on in the bathrooms.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We didn't find anything in the walls?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You found some toilet paper.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anything to eat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You found some toilet paper. You found the weird little ghost that hides in the-- have you ever seen the ghost on the pipe? You can pull that lever and see what happens.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could keep going back around. There's conference rooms back there now, where they keep all the games where you shot The Slayer's Cake.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, let's go search.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those dragon torches are there, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You guys are going to go check out the library wall?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As we go, I'm going to tell Liam: Listen, I convinced Laura that I'm on her side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did she believe you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Totally.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you sure?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. When she goes down, she's going to try to kick you or throw you down or trip you up, but I'm going to walk behind her, club her in the back of the head, and we're going to make off like bandits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, are you guys going as far as the bookcase? Are you guys going deeper in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The bookcase is literally the end of my knowledge of the way out of the building.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will lead Sam-- unless we see something of note.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to take a look at the bookcase?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. Do I see anything--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there more building past the bookcase?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is a little bit more. There's a couple of conference rooms. Glass doors, windows.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There was a map that you guys could find, but you're never going to find it, which makes me laugh really hard. But yes, there's a--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're walking past these shelves of tabletop games.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. You can do a perception investigation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Perception investigation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or you can use occult, if that's a better number for you as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I failed on a red.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You got a one on a red?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I also failed on a red.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You both failed on a red, but what was your score total?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two successes, one fail on a red.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One success.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You guys, you talk about looking at the bookshelf, but you're just talking to each other, and going back and forth talking about how foolish Laura was to trust you. Yeah, you're just doing a bit. You just keep doing a bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we get through this, we have to record another episode of the podcast. And not one that we do at the convention, Sam--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We recorded one at the convention and then I never edited it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You never edited it, dumbass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Man, we have it right now. It's already done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we got to release that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yuck, nope, nevermind. That didn't happen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's another one. Just you and me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With some other people. Yeah, we'll do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't you stand up and come with me and we'll come back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "She can't stand up until I say so and I need a player."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can try.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "You can try and stand up."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (straining)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, you now see what's in front of you, once you're--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, god, what's going on?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't stand up. I'm so hungry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's nowhere near us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ivan's here and has electrical powers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, the voided room is back here? Oh, I didn't realize where it was.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like I'm the only one who's explored this entire building. There are some nooks and crannies, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know what's in the actual building. I didn't know the void was back here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Spend enough time back there and it's a real void. It's kind of intense.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Apparently Ivan's made of electricity now and he has a card game for us to play, but he needs players.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Come sit."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sam, you want to come play this card game?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And do what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why can't-- looks like you're playing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many chairs are there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three. Two. Two empty chairs along with her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of the three of us, only two others can play.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Or once I have somebody else sitting down, somebody else can get up."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What, to fill the chairs? What kind of game is it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You draw a card. She drew a card and learned something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did. I learned something about the thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It seems like Travis should play. He's a card guy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Straight up, do you think this is safe for me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Is anything safe? I mean, come on, people."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you feel? For me, I mean.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Given my general feeling of our environment, I think almost all this shit's fucked up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just a fair bit of sprinkling of that, just about everywhere I look.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we find someone else to play this game?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we go find somebody else to play this game? Are there any others?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a good idea? Actually, Sam, why don't you go snag--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dani?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Max?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we see Max yet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's Max?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Max is back in the office. He's wearing a Drink Me sign. Why don't you go snag Max?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, if I'm not back in 30 seconds...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a long walk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going to walk or are you going to jog?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll run.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, well done, you. You go really fast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, two of them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have a power!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a power. What's my power?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You go really fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Celerity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is he a speedster now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your body responds so quickly that the world around you seems to slow down.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was really hoping you were going to try and hit Arcade at some point and there was just going to be a fwap! But no, you were so nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wow. I go all over the place. Okay. All right, so I'm going to run back there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we burn that blood, you are back in seconds with Max. He doesn't even really quite register what happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Burn that blood. What do I do? What's--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You just have an extra blood die now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Max! Come sit down!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He is at the point where he is just going to do what he's told, so he sits down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Max, sit down at the table.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Can I get up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you can get up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now, before we leave, I would like to see a card drawn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. Max can pull one, then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Max, pull a card.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Max jolts and has a weird clarity to him for the first time in-- it seems like his eyes unpuffen and he just looks like a normal-- moisture comes back to his face and he looks slightly healthier and he's got a moment of, "We've got to get out of here before that thing upstairs "comes down."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's upstairs, Max?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "It's this creature. It's just teeth and claws and I'm not going to say wolf, but there's "something up there that's big and--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beast-like?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "It's been a lot. There's been a lot that's happened."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Max, the last thing we remember is leaving after the last game. How long have you been here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "After the last game? That's the last thing you--" (sighs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Max, what happened? How long has it been?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "It's been a long week."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's been a whole week?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it Thursday again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I haven't seen the sun in three days, four days? I don't know what-- no one knows what's "going on. Things have gotten very weird, but you've got to get us out of here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do people in the outside world know what's happening?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When I look at Ivan, does he look disappointed or pleased with the outcome of this card pull?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's waiting for another player.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, Max, come with us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I can't get up."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll tell you what, Max, sit tight. We'll be back for you. Ivan, we'll try and find you another player.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I, and I'll say, if you wanted to see if you can figure out a little bit more about "what's happening, can't win if you don't play."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, he has a good point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Max, you want to pick another card?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tell him to pick another card.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Make Max do it? No, we need to do it, so we know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're right. You're right, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want me to do it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, you had the inspiration. One of us should pick a card.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're certainly the most clever person at the table.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you'll be able to solve it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I sit down though, will I be able to get up again?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, as long as Max is at the table.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as Max doesn't get up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'll draw a card.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sit down. Draw a card.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What could possibly go wrong?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It can only go right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What'd you get, what'd you get?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The three of swords. More blood?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three bloods?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, what are you at?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm at three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have three bloods already?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Uh-oh. Spaghetti-Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. You've maxed out your hunger.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Give me all your blood dice. Your blood is at zero.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're not hungry any more.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're not hungry at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At all?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're not hungry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How does Max look?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Max is very pale, and he's not moving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) You killed Max.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're fast as shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sam, you killed Max!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I run over to Max and check his pulse with my fingers on his carotid?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The only reason Max isn't slumping over is he's still glued to the seat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gruffly) I don't know what came over me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Max is dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take my dagger and try to stab Ivan while he's distracted with all of that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yelling) It's on! Wait, I get a question, I get a question first!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We were going to get fucking knowledge first! We were supposed to get knowledge!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You go in and try and stab Ivan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to stab Ivan!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Let's do dex plus--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Max died for nothing!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He would have let you die! He wouldn't let you leave!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You would have been stuck here forever!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But we could have used him and gotten an answer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He was already up out of the chair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You still get a question. We'll see how it goes. Dex plus melee.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dex plus melee?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Melee, not brawl?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you have a weapon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really? That's so dumb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, take it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't know that's what it meant.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll tell you what. What's your level two power?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Obfuscate. Unseen presence.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never mind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could have done it before he realized what I was doing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. You can take a stab. See how it goes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool. What? Strength plus melee?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm letting you do dex melee.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like the impulse to violence.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you know why she's doing this? It's because we made a pact to stick together. She's protecting me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! Three successes and a crit! Well, just one ten. Not technically a crit, but all three were successes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Shot to the heart, and you're too late.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: God! That's so many dice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three successes and crit? Two successes and a crit. Okay. So I'm going to give you success with point. You pin him with the blade to the table.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "That's uncalled for."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you just seemed like you were probably kind of mean.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "This is really-- this is a lot. This is a lot."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what's going on, Ivan. I'm sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he bleeding profusely?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is he bleeding at all?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what they say about shit that doesn't bleed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's stuck to the chair, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, well, at least maybe, Sam, ask your question.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I feel like there's things that need to be addressed before we get to a question. I want "to play the game as much as anybody, but--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I'm just saying. The game is still going on. I totally interrupted the game. You know, we should just-- I just try to hold him on to the chair. I'm just going to keep holding on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "No, can you help with this? This is a lot."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, no, I'm trying to let you go, but I'm definitely trying to keep him in the chair. I'm trying to let it-- you're not coming off of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "These prop replicas are really well made. This is not--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I get off the chair that I'm on or no?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Weirdly, the corpse is making it possible at the moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. I'll stay there so we can ask our questions or whatever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Ask your question, quick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes, my question! Can we--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ivan, my wife is very careful about these things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I understand this has been a very stressful time for everybody, but let's--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just killed Max.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yeah, you did."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's super stressful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "That wasn't cool."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "That was really uncalled for. Like, it's all fun and games, sure, and we poke you a "little bit here. I'm going to poke you, but come on! Jeez."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to come up behind Laura and press into her elbow and I'll press the blade in and use Awe again and say: Ivan, I mean it's really all about leverage, right? We need some information and I feel like we've earned it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the roll for that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Charisma plus persuasion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going to be interesting. Is it versus anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, charisma persuasion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doesn't he have to take a hunger dice for it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, he's going to take a hunger die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You try to screw over your--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I'm sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Old habits, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm really bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, what do we got here? Nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You just got to kill someone in order to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got two successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh. Yeah, he critted against you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that didn't work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That didn't work, but you're still going to take your hunger die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you need to know?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you need to know?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Let's just deal with this."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did we find out so far?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We found that in order for the head to be unlocked, we have to put something on it that proves we know we're vampires.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about the cross?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't know that one yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do we need to overcome the cross part of the puzzle?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "It's a sign of faith. Any kind of sign of faith. God, that one should be obvious. You "need some sort of sign of faith. There's a dozen answers to that one. That one's the easy one. I "mean, oh god, okay, that's, wow."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it hurt?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "What do you think? Does it look like--?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't look like you're in a lot of pain, I can't tell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I'm upset. I'm angry. I didn't mean to take it out on you. Actually, you stabbed me, I "think you get a little bit of this."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Sorry, Ivan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ivan are you like us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I mean, I think of myself as a very good roleplayer, so I'd like to think that."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you a vampire?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Just me! I'm just clever and I want the best game possible!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's upstairs?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "That's a pull."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I go over to Max's corpse and pat down his pockets to see if he's carrying anything cool?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's not carrying anything cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it, Max.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You think we're at Burning Man right now, don't you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to pull my dagger out of him, I guess.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Don't mind that; it's mostly flair."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So aside from upstairs, we know pretty much everything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "You guys have everything you need, let's be serious here. If you really want to know "another clue, I'd tell you that you've got a cross, you've got the head. You need something "cerebral, something grand, and you need something of faith."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "And I'd do it soon if I were you. The sun's setting."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The sun's setting? That's a good thing, though, that means we can go outside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yeah, and also means other things can come in."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Let's remind you that if you see anybody, the table's open, and I'd really like "some new players."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got it. Sorry about the stabbing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "It happens."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks for your cooperation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Thank you for playing."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I make my way out of that room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ditto, quickly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You come out, you pass the war room, the meeting room, you pass the bookshelf.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I see anything cool on the bookshelves?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you look in the bookshelf?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You didn't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take a perception investigation or perception occult.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Occult?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, whichever one strikes your fancy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hail Satan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Liam, did you see how fast I was?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't see you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's some cool shit in the cage, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four successes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Four successes? There's some cool shit in the cage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's in the cage? Where's my cage? There's some stakes, there's a cross in the cage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, get that cross!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You, on the other hand, with four successes--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Five? Well, four was the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What you needed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a very old-looking book on the top shelf that you don't recall seeing there before. It's a small, black leather book with a little bit of silver on it, and you can't make it out, but there's something about it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I climb the shelves to get up to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take the cage and open it up. There's a steak in there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They've got a bunch of props from the last run--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it a real steak or a rubber steak?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's Sagas of Sundry, and it's us, so it's much cheaper for us to use real stakes. A rubber stake, a rubber chicken.

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Chattering teeth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was going, "meat steak?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just a big T-bone, sitting there in a cage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are in a Looney Tunes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will take that stake, and I will also take--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A cross in there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a cross.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take the cross.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, can I take my shirt off--

lines.name: TALIESIN, LIAM, SAM
lines.text: Always.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And can I throw the shirt over the cross to try and pick it up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, he's a vampire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Clever. Interesting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Smart. He knows all these vampire things because he watches werewolf movies, and vampires attack them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought he was scared of scary stuff?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he's into it. He's scared of ghosts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's seen The Lost Boys. I know that's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can't tell if it felt weird because it felt weird, or felt weird because you expected it to feel weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. When my shirt is off, does my skin sparkle at all?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No more than normal. That body glitter, it's nuts. There's a book, and it's a small, black leather book.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it have in it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On the cover is a skull with fangs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, I bet this is a thing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a death note!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Skull book. Does it tell me how to be a vampire?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You open it up, and it is entitled, "The Telling of the Book of Nod."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's prose, and it's long, and it's hard to read because it's been hand-inked, but there seems to be a lot of interesting information here about vampires, and about what they can do and who they are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I learn anything cool about myself?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Step one: Eat bloods.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can peruse it for a second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I want to peruse it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, let's do a fun one. Roll wits linguistics, just because I'm a jerk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wits and linguistics?

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: Oh, crazy. Are we like out there? How fucking creepy would it be if we walked out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking don't jump out and scare me. I will attack whoever comes out here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's good to know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you jump out on me, it's not going to go well for that person.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going to look around at all other than like, as you walk over? There's little nooks and crannies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stay away from them so that I can be sneaky.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to be sneaky. Which direction are you going to come from?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go, well, there's really only one way around. I'm going to go around this back way, around that other stage so that, when they come up this way--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You do see a pile of corpses back there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They look like very competent corpses, the corpses of extremely competent people who make things work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Our crew.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, god. Like, around the other side of the stage? Like they're hidden?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're kind of piled in the shoebox at the moment. Also, make a perception check really quickly, a base perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's cocked, unfortunately. One success.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everything's changed. Things have been moved around. Everything's a little shifted. The Wednesday Club table is leaning against the door back here. People have been moved around. That's my weird music.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I couldn't tell! It sounded like the crew was making creepy noises!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Talks set has been folded away and is in a little package. Everything's been strewn through and there's some new-- go ahead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look for my dice bag? My giant one that's as big as a head. So I can roll, like, dice on the ground if I need to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know where to find it, so you go look for it? As you open up the cabinet, there seems to be some sort of, I don't know, it looks like maybe it's a pyrotechnic device. It looks like something designed to explode in the cabinet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, it's going to explode if I touch it, or I can take it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you touch things that look like they're going to explode?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not usually. Is it close by my bag that I need?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's some sort of explosive device in here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take my bag.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Laura, where'd you go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're the shade.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I said I took it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You guys, where are you heading?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which way did you go? To the left? Oh, you went to the right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I got my dice and I was going to go around, but I can come up this way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And she saw the giant pile of Chief and Courtney.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, we recognize a few of the corpses?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, it depends on how-- Yeah, probably. It's a good pile.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll make my way toward the command center where all the computers and tricasters.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're all running. There's somebody sitting at the head of the table, but you can't quite see. It's no one you recognize, and you can't quite figure out who it is. There's a little off-kilter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're making sure nobody's going to jump out at you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I was entranced.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everything's a little off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I keep going up more.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You see, painted in blood across the outside of the set--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This set?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This set. "Life needs things to live."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, Taliesin's inside! Are you inside this set?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The person that I can't see. Hello?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You see hair. There's a little tuft of white hair and someone furiously writing notes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Excuse me, we just made our--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "You made it! Oh, that's super." There in front of you is a pale, older gentleman with a bit of a beard and thin at the hair, but he's an older gentleman. Quite pale and porcelain skin, like he's definitely, I don't want to say "jolly" vampire, but there's something so charming about him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we recognize his face?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make an intelligence, oh, what would I call this? Either academics or occult.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you all walking in the set?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Liam and I never said which way we had gone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is two successes. Of three dice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think I would be a good ways behind big man, watching him work his magic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just rolled academics, nothing else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Where's everybody else?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry to interrupt you. Are you responsible for the puzzle lock on the door?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Ivan was really happy to help, so we sort of-- Actually, Ivan really helped put it together. He's "a smart kid."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My name is Travis--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Oh yeah, I know. Hi. It's a pleasure."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pleasure. And you are?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "My name's Gary. It's a pleasure. Gary Gygax. I'm a big fan. It's really nice to meet you "in person. This is great."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I mean, that's fair to say."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gary Gygax is no longer living!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks, Liam! We found ourselves in a bit of a situation. Do you happen to know what's going on around here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "This is great. I'm so excited about the next stage of everything. This is really, super exciting."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there anyone else in this studio at the moment?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Probably not at the moment. I've got some people outside, we're ready to load the "trucks. Everything's up to go. Everything is more or less set up. I've got some people, we've got "some things coming in and out. There's a lot of commotion. This is a big process."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Outside? Forgive me, this is all very new to me, but isn't the sun up outside?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "For a minute longer, and then of course Ivan can take care of that. He's very clever that "way. But we have people. I mean, you'll know this someday, you get to a certain point and you have "people who can do these things for you. It's really nice."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Sam? Liam? Laura?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm coming up and I'm going to say: Big fan--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Thank you! See, the riddle was a double thing, because, you know, vampires come from a "box, and Dungeons & Dragons comes from a box! It's a double pun. I was really, it was actually Ivan "who came up with it, but I signed off."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still not in, and I'm unscrewing two pipes for a microphone setup so I can have a bar in my hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's smart to have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm creeping around the side and stealthily peeking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he on this set, or is he at the control board?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's sitting right here. Make a perception investigation. I'm excited to see if you find this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to pull out my Wyrmwood gaming tray from under the table over there and hand it to him and ask him to sign it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, happily. He is into it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is a breeze coming from under the Wednesday Club table.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good find!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mr. Gygax, I'm not really sure what comes next. Can you tell us a little bit about what we have to look forward to?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Well, I was waiting till everybody was going to be here, but everybody I'm sure is still "having a time. It's a mess out there, I really apologize."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You killed our dungeon master, so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's going to be fine. "

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He turned to ash in the sun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, unfortunately--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you saying that once the magic is broken, everybody comes back to life again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "No. What? Wait, where's Matt?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Matthew Mercer opened a curtain near the front of the building and was struck by a ray of sunlight. Is that not reversible?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I mean, I was aware that one of you might-- something bad might happen, but we need him!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not just Matt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We do need him for the show.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I mean, you guys ended everything! We worked really hard to make sure you can keep doing "this for as long as we need, and you let your dungeon master walk into the sun! You guys are "great. You're the best. God, ugh."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before you freak out--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it's past that a little.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "What are you doing now that Matt's gone?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've run a one-shot! I know how to DM!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "That one-shot was, let's be fair, that was mostly math and you were riding on the talent "of your players. Let's be fair."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Liam's done a couple! Liam's pretty good!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not here. I'm quietly looking for Laura outside of the Critical Role table.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is Liam dead too?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, Liam's alive!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Or not, he's undead, apparently. We went to all this trouble."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Marisha turned to mushroom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Oh, for God's sakes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There was tea, apparently, and she had some.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have some weird people here, you know that? God!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We ate some of them, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) Twinnie!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "You know, you should never meet your heroes. This is very disappointing."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was he calling us--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think that's a compliment. Weird, backhanded compliment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I was happy for a while. I don't even, like--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Twinnie! Laura!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stealthy. "We had a plan. We had an underground "bunker for you guys to shoot from. We were putting together a new crew. We had every-- Oh my god, the "money, and--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You had to pay for this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "This was expensive, and I mean, there are rules about what you can do, and I have done "some things to make this happen that are a little questionable."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A little? Well, you know, you could have asked us to come play! Hey, wait! Wait! You're a dungeon master! You could lead the game, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "This is nothing personal, Sam. I just really wanted to play with Matt." (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dunked on by Gary Gygax! Posterized! The burn is real! Sunbeam!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He clicks a button on a remote. "Well, regardless, it was really nice to meet you. I have "something I'd love for you to sign. Well, you've got about 60 seconds, so I figure we might as well "get this done before everything goes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What happens in 60 seconds?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Well, I mean, we've got to clean up everything, so. You're welcome to go outside if "you like, but otherwise we're taking care of this right now."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I peek my head in right there where he can't see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I dive over to where she is. What do we do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We would love to sign whatever it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need a silver Sharpie.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're very particular about the metallic colors. It's right over by the computers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "You're not trying to-- I mean, there's nowhere to go, is there?" He starts to get up, and he starts to grow claws.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to speed-dash toward Laura and Liam.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's starting to get a little Baba Yaga-y. There's claws coming out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now, Mr. Gygax, there's really no need to grow shit out of your hands. I merely want to sign whatever-- What do you have for me to sign?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He slowly reaches in and pulls out Matt Mercer's Vecna statue. "You'll sign that, and I'll "be taking it."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that will be fine. I grab the Vecna statue. You don't happen to have a pen on you, do you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's flip. Oh! As he reaches for a pen, suddenly, at great speed, there's a blur that comes and smashes him against the side of the wall. He is briefly dazed as you see there's another vampire, teeth out, eyes blazing, holding him against the wall, and he turns and looks at you all, and Matt Colville says, "This is your moment! Run! Run!" and goes in and holds Gary Gygax against the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's get out of here!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Outside! Tunnel, I've got a tunnel! There's a tunnel!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go out the tunnel!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, he said there was a studio downstairs!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Blam, Blam, Blam!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're starting to wrestle with each other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We run down the tunnel!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You run? Man, just as you run down the tunnel, Gary Gygax breaks his hold on Matt Colville. They break apart and Gary makes a run for the tunnel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gary does, or Matt does?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gary. Matt's against the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take the Vecna statue and I go, ah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's enough to distract. Just in a second if you all get underneath the Wednesday Club table--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we'll be back next week with your subterranean adventures, now that you've killed two of the greatest DMs-- Three of the greatest DMs that have ever lived.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two Matts dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two Matts dead, and a Gygax. Well done.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, but the three new best DMs in the world have survived, so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like Gary was quite clear on that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have not killed any humans yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good for you, babe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know what you get for that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hungry, fucker. What are you at?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's five.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, next time you see one, it's going. Hey guys! I hope you enjoyed my-- I'm going to be a little bit more together next time. This was a little bit ramshackle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You were great!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, I had fun. It's going to be a little different. I'm going to play a little bit more, we're going to have more fun with the social and maybe get into a little bit of the World of Darkness now that I feel like they've got a hang on things. I'm going to give everyone a little more power and a little more idea of what they can do. Shift things around. We may have a special guest. Maybe, maybe not, since it's only four of you. I may get one more for fun. We'll see. I haven't reached out yet because we have so much shit to do over the next 48 hours, all of us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, everything else on pause.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Werewolves are tough, man. Anyway, thank you guys so much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks to our sponsor, Backblaze! Cloud-based subscription. They back up software. Get it, download it, and use backblaze.com/criticalrole to get special other things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right. If you haven't tried it, give it a try.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stay safe, have fun, and is it Thursday yet? (evil laughter) [music]
